wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Topping (born 6 March 1951) is an English former footballer.

response: He joined York City, who were then in the Fourth Division, in July 1970 and played four matches for the team, with these appearances coming after an injury to Chris Topping after the opening day of the 1970–71 season.
